content: Setup: Start development server and verify environment
Setup: Create QA directory structure for screenshots
Setup: Verify Playwright and authentication credentials
Testing: Login and save authentication state
Testing: Student Management - Full CRUD operations
Testing: Group Management - Full CRUD operations
Testing: Lesson Planning - Full CRUD operations
Testing: Notes System - Full CRUD with drag-drop
Testing: Messages - Send, reply, mark, delete
Testing: Settings - Test all toggles and preferences
Testing: Test all modals and dropdowns
Testing: Final cleanup and screenshot copying
